description: Creates a new Timestream batch load task. A batch load task processes data from a CSV source in an S3 location and writes to a Timestream table. A mapping from source to target is defined in a batch load task. Errors and events are written to a report at an S3 location. For the report, if the KMS key is not specified, the report will be encrypted with an S3 managed key when SSE_S3 is the option. Otherwise an error is thrown. For more information, see Amazon Web Services managed keys. Service quotas apply. For details, see code sample.

parameters.name: DataModelConfiguration
parameters.description: TimeColumn (string) --- Source column to be mapped to time. TimeUnit (string) --- The granularity of the timestamp unit. It indicates if the time value is in seconds, milliseconds, nanoseconds, or other supported values. Default is MILLISECONDS. Source to target mappings for dimensions. (dict) --- SourceColumn (string) --- DestinationColumn (string) --- MultiMeasureMappings (dict) --- Source to target mappings for multi-measure records. TargetMultiMeasureName (string) --- (dict) --- TargetMultiMeasureAttributeName (string) --- MeasureValueType (string) --- MixedMeasureMappings (list) --- Source to target mappings for measures. (dict) --- MeasureName (string) --- SourceColumn (string) --- TargetMeasureName (string) --- MultiMeasureAttributeMappings (list) --- (dict) --- TargetMultiMeasureAttributeName (string) --- MeasureValueType (string) --- MeasureNameColumn (string) --- DataModelS3Configuration (dict) --- BucketName (string) --- ObjectKey (string) ---

nested_params.name: TimeColumn
nested_params.description: Source column to be mapped to time.

nested_params.name: TimeUnit
nested_params.description: The granularity of the timestamp unit. It indicates if the time value is in seconds, milliseconds, nanoseconds, or other supported values. Default is MILLISECONDS.

nested_params.name: DimensionMappings
nested_params.description: Source to target mappings for dimensions.

nested_params.name: MultiMeasureMappings
nested_params.description: Source to target mappings for multi-measure records.

nested_params.name: MixedMeasureMappings
nested_params.description: Source to target mappings for measures.

parameters.name: DataSourceConfiguration
parameters.description: Defines configuration details about the data source for a batch load task. Configuration of an S3 location for a file which contains data to load. The bucket name of the customer S3 bucket. ObjectKeyPrefix (string) --- CsvConfiguration (dict) --- A delimited data format where the column separator can be a comma and the record separator is a newline character. ColumnSeparator (string) --- Column separator can be one of comma (--,'), pipe ('|), semicolon (--;'), tab(--/t'), or blank space (' --). EscapeChar (string) --- Escape character can be one of QuoteChar (string) --- Can be single quote (') or double quote ('). NullValue (string) --- Can be blank space (' --). TrimWhiteSpace (boolean) --- Specifies to trim leading and trailing white space. This is currently CSV.

nested_params.name: DataSourceS3Configuration
nested_params.description: Configuration of an S3 location for a file which contains data to load.

nested_params.name: BucketName
nested_params.description: The bucket name of the customer S3 bucket.

nested_params.name: CsvConfiguration
nested_params.description: A delimited data format where the column separator can be a comma and the record separator is a newline character.

nested_params.name: ColumnSeparator
nested_params.description: Column separator can be one of comma (--,'), pipe ('|), semicolon (--;'), tab(--/t'), or blank space (' --).

nested_params.name: EscapeChar
nested_params.description: Escape character can be one of.

nested_params.name: QuoteChar

nested_params.name: TrimWhiteSpace
nested_params.description: Specifies to trim leading and trailing white space.

parameters.name: ReportConfiguration
parameters.description: Report configuration for a batch load task. This contains details about where error reports are stored. ReportS3Configuration (dict) --- Configuration of an S3 location to write error reports and events for a batch load. ObjectKeyPrefix (string) --- EncryptionOption (string) --- KmsKeyId (string) ---

nested_params.name: ReportS3Configuration
nested_params.description: Configuration of an S3 location to write error reports and events for a batch load.

parameters.name: TargetDatabaseName
parameters.description: Target Timestream database for a batch load task.

parameters.name: TargetTableName
parameters.description: Target Timestream table for a batch load task.
